name: Corny Heist (LD52 Entry)
description:
Small game about stealing corn. Made in 72 hours for the LudumDare 52 Game Jam.

Credits
  • Programming: Artyom Nikishin aka "TetrianDev"
  • 2D Art: Svetlana Kh. aka "Aokich" - https://www.artstation.com/aoko-deska
  • Music: "Sotonushka" - https://soundcloud.com/karen-ter-mesropyan
  • Level Design: Viktor Karpov aka "CthulhuVorotila - https://www.linkedin.com/in/viktorkarpov
  • Game Design: V.Ch.
